title: Breaking 120: How Carbohydrate Hyper-Fueling Will Reshape Pro Cycling
content:
Experts believe the supposed 'carb ceiling' can be shattered - the performance impact could be bonkers: '120g/hr is a reference, but the exact number is far higher.'

Read the full article at Breaking 120: How Carbohydrate Hyper-Fueling Will Reshape Pro Cycling on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
